title: Add additional images for Hospital Furniture and Laboratory Setup on Products page

requirements.text: Add multiple new static image assets for the Hospital Furniture category and the Laboratory Setup category under frontend/public/assets/generated, and ensure each image has appropriate English alt text available for rendering in the UI.

quotes: Add some images in hospital furniture sections and Laboratory Setup section

acceptanceCriteria: New image files are added under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
Each new image has an English alt text string defined in frontend content/data (not hardcoded only in JSX) so it can be used consistently in the UI.

requirements.text: Update the product categories data so the Hospital Furniture category card displays a photo (similar to ICU Setup, OT Setup, and Laboratory Setup), using one of the newly added Hospital Furniture images and a descriptive English alt text.

quotes: Add some images in hospital furniture sections and Laboratory Setup section

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/categories.ts includes a photo and photoAlt for the category with id 'furniture'.
On the Products page category grid, the Hospital Furniture card renders its photo at the top (using the existing CategoryCard behavior) without breaking the layout for the other categories.

requirements.text: Add dedicated sections on the Products page for Hospital Furniture and for Laboratory Setup that each display a small responsive gallery (multiple images) using the newly added static assets, keeping styling consistent with existing ICU/OT detail sections and ensuring the layout works on mobile and desktop.

quotes: Add some images in hospital furniture sections and Laboratory Setup section

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx includes a "Hospital Furniture" section containing a responsive image grid/gallery that renders at least 3 Hospital Furniture images from frontend/public/assets/generated.

frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx includes a "Laboratory Setup" section containing a responsive image grid/gallery that renders at least 2 Laboratory Setup images from frontend/public/assets/generated (in addition to the existing Laboratory Setup category card photo).
All images rendered in these galleries include meaningful English alt text.
No images are served from the backend; all new images are referenced via /assets/generated/... paths.

constraints: Do not serve images from the backend; render images only as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the existing single-actor Motoko backend unchanged (no backend changes required for this request).
nonGoals: Do not add new product categories beyond the existing ICU Setup, OT Setup, Hospital Furniture, and Laboratory Setup.
Do not implement a CMS, admin upload flow, or dynamic image management; this change is static assets + frontend rendering only.
Do not change existing ICU Setup or OT Setup requirement lists/content as part of this request.
